name: Synthetic user research
description: Test ideas and surveys with AI participants.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answer
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

survey_context.title: Survey context
survey_context.description: The context of the survey questions you wish to test.

ui_metadata.value: To understand the use cases for customer experience and how they are currently doing these tasks manually.

target_audience.title: Respondent characteristics
target_audience.description: Specify the traits of the respondents you'd like to answer your survey questions. description

ui_metadata.value: Customer experience leaders in enterprises that are enthusiastic about AI.

survey_questions.title: Survey questions
survey_questions.description: The survey question you want to get answered by AI participants.

ui_metadata.value: What specific customer experience tasks do you currently perform manually and would like to improve with AI technology? Please provide examples.  How do you currently measure customer satisfaction and gather feedback? Are there any specific areas where you believe AI could enhance these processes?  In your opinion, what are the biggest challenges or pain points in delivering exceptional customer experiences? How do you think AI can help address these challenges?
